bibl.title: The Asyut Project: Tenth Season of Fieldwork (2012).

bibl.seg: Jochem Kahl, Mahmoud El-Khadragy, Ursula Verhoeven, Mohamed Abdelrahiem & Ewa Czyżewska, The Asyut Project: Tenth Season of Fieldwork (2012).
Studien zur Altägyptischen Kultur 42 (2013) pp. 123-153, 26 figg. et pll. 7-13.

Ancient necropolis of Asyut, Joint mission of Sohag University, Freie Universität Berlin and Johannes Gutenberg-Universität Mainz. See in part. pp. 138-153: Ewa Czyżewska, Late Roman Pottery from Gebel Asyut al-Gharbi. - Avec résumé en anglais.
